caption:
“When all is stripped away, only truth remains.”

Reflection:
In the bare silence of surrender, illusion falls away. What endures is God alone.

Commentary:
This line speaks of spiritual purification — the shedding of all pretenses until only what is eternal remains. Truth thrives in simplicity.
